<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Openness
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, client feedback regarding Designli reflects a strong sentiment of openness throughout the project engagement. Clients appreciated Designli&#39;s proactive communication and transparency, with one stating they found the team &#39;extremely communicative, open, and transparent&#39; in addressing questions. Another client highlighted the team&#39;s &#39;patience, open-mindedness, and optimism,&#39; which facilitated effective collaboration. Additionally, clients noted Designli&#39;s ability to ask clarifying questions to better understand their needs, enhancing the project&#39;s alignment with their goals.
      </p>
    </div>

Client reviews reveal a high level of satisfaction, with approximately 90% of reviewers praising their project management skills, timely delivery, and professionalism. The company is commended for its flexibility, responsiveness, and value for cost, with 80% of clients noting the team's ability to understand and execute project requirements effectively.

    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="944957"
              data-gtm_insight_id="978637"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Creative
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Creative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express high satisfaction with Matrix Media Solutions (P) Ltd.&#39;s creativity and professionalism. One reviewer noted their &#39;phenomenal&#39; experience, highlighting the team&#39;s ability to fix unresolved issues from previous developers. The Head of Key Accounts, Pritam, and VP, Abhishek, were praised for their innovative ideas, particularly in developing an engaging monetization strategy. The overall sentiment reflects confidence in their technical skills and a strong collaborative relationship, fostering excitement about the project.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

Clients frequently commend their ability to complete projects on schedule, with one CEO noting their &#39;commitment to getting it done on a timely basis.&#39; Another client emphasized that Code&amp;Care &#39;has almost always been right on the money&#39; for project completion. Their project management is described as &#39;wonderful,&#39; showcasing adaptability and punctuality, leading to a strong reputation for reliability in meeting deadlines.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Honest
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Wve Labs for their honesty and transparency throughout the project lifecycle. One client highlighted their clear communication regarding project feasibility, stating they appreciated Wve Labs&#39; ability to delineate what was possible versus what was not. Another client noted their flexibility and willingness to address urgent needs, describing their support as &#39;honest and flexible,&#39; which was crucial in navigating a challenging situation. Overall, clients express a strong sentiment of trust and satisfaction with Wve Labs&#39; integrity.
      </p>
    </div>

Their services are consistently praised for professionalism, quick response times, and a seamless integration into client teams, with 100% of the reviews highlighting their effective communication and team collaboration. However, some clients noted budget concerns, although many returned due to the quality and trustworthiness of MindSea's work.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Customized support
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have praised MindSea for their customized support, highlighting the professionalism and friendliness of the team. One client noted the service felt &#39;bespoke and personalized,&#39; emphasizing the clear communication and tailored project management. They reported that MindSea exceeded their expectations in meeting project needs, with no areas for improvement identified. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the attentive and individualized support provided throughout the development process.
      </p>
    </div>

            </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Hard working
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Eden Tech Labs&#39; hard work and dedication. One client noted that the team was very involved, often exceeding initial time commitments to ensure project success. Another emphasized their impressive time-management skills and willingness to adapt to changing requirements, stating they delivered results in a &#39;no excuses&#39; fashion. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the team&#39;s effort and commitment to client needs, positioning them as a reliable partner.
      </p>
    </div>

<meta itemprop="position" content="6">

<div
    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc "
    data-is-list="true"
    data-clutch-pid="323167"
    data-title="Borne Digital"

    
        data-position="1206"
        data-type="Directory"

<button
    type="button"
    name="bookmark"
    class="sg-shortlist-bookmark sg-shortlist-bookmark--default"
    data-shortlist-state="default"
    aria-label="Add to Shortlist"
    data-shortlist-link="https://shortlist.clutch.co"
    data-provider-id="323167"

                    title="Read Full Review on Jafton"
                    aria-label="Read Full Review on Jafton"
                    class="provider__description-text-more  project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Jafton is a dedicated Mobile App Development company specializing in creating and enhancing mobile applications with a strong emphasis on performance, user experience, and integration. Across various reviews, 100% of clients praised their responsive project management and technical skills, highlighting their ability to deliver on time and adapt to client needs efficiently. Although some clients noted areas for improvement in initial project planning and documentation, the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, with clients reporting increased user engagement and satisfaction post-collaboration.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a highly positive sentiment regarding SOLTIX Software House&#39;s collaborative approach. Notably, a team manager from Decathlon highlighted the extensive workshops conducted, which reflected a deep commitment to understanding their operational needs. The client praised SOLTIX for their constructive cooperation, high-quality project management, and adaptability, stating that the team showed great dedication to ensuring the project&#39;s success and fostering effective communication throughout the process.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2082787"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="243605"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1964733"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Dev & UI/UX Design for Decathlon</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 24, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We admire their quality project management, <b>cooperation</b>, punctuality, and commitment. Commitment, 100% adaptation to needs, <b>declaration that nothing is impossible</b>, Courtesy, respect and high work culture.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Results-oriented
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Feedback regarding Steamclock Software&#39;s results-oriented approach is overwhelmingly positive. Clients noted timely and consistent delivery of complex features, such as multi-factor authentication and live trading capabilities. One client emphasized the agile project management style, highlighting that all work was completed within deadlines while meeting both business and technical requirements. The culture of the team was also praised, contributing to an environment that fosters effective problem-solving and engagement.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="37795"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="198077"
          data-gtm_insight_id="725608"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Design, Dev & Maintenance for Investing Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 28, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Project management appears very agile and <b>focused on delivering results</b>. Work was always completed within established deadlines. Business and technical requirements were always met. <b>Testing is also thorough and accountable</b>. The communication style and habits are conducive to a fun experience where the project never gets off track.
            </p>
          </div>

Across reviews, 75% of clients commend their reliability and prompt response times, while 50% highlight their strong technical skills. A notable theme is their ability to align with client needs and deliver on time, although improvements in senior staffing and turnover were occasionally suggested.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Creative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding Memory Squared&#39;s creativity is highly positive, as clients frequently highlight their innovative problem-solving and design capabilities. One client noted their &#39;super creative approach&#39; and &#39;in-depth technology knowledge,&#39; while another emphasized Memory Squared&#39;s ability to transform vague project requirements into user-friendly designs. The proactive communication and adaptability of the team further enhance their creative contributions, leading to successful project outcomes and satisfied clients.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2051375"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="293263"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1152822"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web App Development for Digital Marketing Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 7, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              I’m impressed with how proactive Memory Squared has been with such vague project requirements — it’s one of the reasons I hired them. Initially, I had challenges putting together a project definition because it was beyond my expertise. Memory Squared has guided me in finding the solution along the onboarding process. Moreover, they’ve been very friendly and <b>creative throughout this process</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="24742"
              data-gtm_insight_id="709412"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Creative
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Creative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed high satisfaction with Guaraná Technologies&#39; creative capabilities, particularly in app design and development. One client noted their surprise at the creativity and quality of work, highlighting minimal bugs and effective testing processes. They appreciated Guaraná&#39;s ability to understand both the product and emerging technologies, fostering a strong collaborative relationship. Overall, the sentiment regarding creativity is overwhelmingly positive, with clients feeling confident in the team&#39;s innovative approach.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="24742"

        >

    <div data-new-summary="true" class="provider__description">
        <div class="provider__project-highlight-text provider__project-highlight-text--summary sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed">
            <p
                    title="Read Full Review on Appinventiv"
                    aria-label="Read Full Review on Appinventiv"
                    class="provider__description-text-more  project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Appinventiv is a mobile application development company specializing in iOS and Android platforms. They have received a mix of both positive and negative feedback, with approximately 70% of the reviews praising their technical proficiency, project management, and commitment to quality. However, around 30% of reviews reflect concerns about communication and delivery issues. Many clients commend their problem-solving abilities and adaptability.
                <div class="provider__more-container">
                    <button class="show-more-button-summary" type="button" aria-label="Show more about provider">
                        Show More
                    </button>
                </div>
            
        </div>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Dedicated
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently express high satisfaction with AppInventiv&#39;s dedication to their projects. One client noted, &#39;AppInventiv’s performance was extremely appreciated&#39; and highlighted their commitment to timely delivery and meticulous attention to detail. They emphasized that the end product exceeded expectations, stating it was &#39;10 times better than what we expected.&#39; Moreover, clients commend their professionalism, transparent communication, and adaptability, indicating a strong overall sentiment of dedication and reliability.
      </p>
    </div>

          data-gtm_insight_id="1706972"

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 26, 2016</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              AppInventiv’s performance was extremely appreciated. We were extremely bullish on this idea and quite certain about our parameters. AppInventiv did grasp our points very well and started with designing tasks. Though the project was short, they <b>dedicated considerable time to it</b> and <b>took care of all the subtleties</b>. We got the project delivered on time with all of our needs fulfilled. In fact, the end product was 10 times better than what we expected. From theme to segmentation of categories, everything was just perfect. Fifty thousand hits on a daily basis is surely not a cakewalk and it’s all because of the <b>hard work and dedication</b> of AppInventiv Technologies.
            </p>

<div

    data-is-list="true"

        data-uid="8af0f074-e045-4fdf-84a6-0e1ae7a843ab"

However, a few reviews note occasional language barriers and coding practices.

        Reviews mention Dedicated
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a high level of satisfaction with Groovy Technoweb Pvt. Ltd.&#39;s dedication, particularly highlighting the commitment of team members like Sagar Patel. Feedback emphasizes their willingness to provide support beyond project requirements, with one client noting Sagar as &#39;one of the most dedicated professionals&#39; they have encountered. The team&#39;s proactive communication and flexibility in addressing long-term goals further reinforce the positive sentiment regarding their dedication to client success.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Dedicated
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients express a strong sentiment of dedication regarding Codebridge Technology, Inc. Their exemplary project management and responsiveness to client needs were frequently highlighted, with one CEO noting their &#39;steadfast commitment to timelines&#39; and &#39;flexibility&#39; throughout the project. Additionally, clients appreciated Codebridge&#39;s dedication to realizing client visions and their unique problem-solving skills, solidifying their reputation as a committed partner in digital projects.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Communicative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently noted FaceIT&#39;s strong communication skills, highlighting their ability to adapt to client workflows effectively. One client remarked on the excellent communication, stating, &#39;the communication tends to be very good,&#39; while another mentioned that they &#39;gelled from the offset&#39; with minimal training required. Despite a minor language barrier, the use of clear visual instructions facilitated smooth interactions, showcasing FaceIT&#39;s commitment to maintaining effective communication throughout the project.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="441381"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="72379"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1287365"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">PHP and Ruby on Rails Development for Web Services Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 25, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We’re very happy with the results and the outcome of the work. It’s all a very high standard, while the <b>communication tends to be very good</b>. I can log in and see what they’ve done. The project management has been done by me rather than their team, so I deal with them individually. We gelled from the offset and I didn’t need to do much training with them. They fit themselves around the way I work. There’s a small language barrier, but because we <b>communicate through text and images</b>, I make sure my instructions are as clear as possible, with illustrations as needed.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Openness
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have noted DONE.&#39;s strong openness in communication and collaboration throughout projects. One reviewer highlighted that during the website development, DONE. responded openly and professionally to all proposals for change. They appreciated the accessibility of team members, which facilitated decision-making. Overall, the sentiment reflects a positive experience, emphasizing DONE.&#39;s commitment to transparency and responsiveness, contributing to effective project execution.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="1012860"

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Dev & Design for Data Science Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 28, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Communication with the team took place along milestones. In addition, <b>they were open to our questions and requests at any time</b>. The meetings were usually attended not only by the project manager, but also responsible for the given work phase, which greatly facilitated the fact that in case of a question, we examined several options and thus made the decision.
            </p>

    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc "

        data-position="1218"

<button
    type="button"
    name="bookmark"
    class="sg-shortlist-bookmark sg-shortlist-bookmark--default"
    data-shortlist-state="default"
    aria-label="Add to Shortlist"
    data-shortlist-link="https://shortlist.clutch.co"
    data-provider-id="31266"
    data-link-type=""
    data-page-name="directory">

        The overall sentiment regarding Bad Dinosaur&#39;s timeliness is highly positive, as highlighted in multiple reviews. Clients consistently noted that project management was impressive, with all work delivered on time. For instance, one client stated, &#39;Sprints were delivered on time with just a slight draw out of deployment to iOS due to problems with Apple,&#39; while another emphasized, &#39;They always replied swiftly and comprehensively to our queries.&#39; This reflects a strong commitment to meeting deadlines and client needs.

            >
                Openness
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Openness
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, client feedback highlights FCG Apps&#39; strong commitment to openness and communication throughout the project. A Project Manager noted the team&#39;s willingness to discuss problems and find solutions, emphasizing their responsiveness and proactive approach. The ability to signal issues and suggest alternatives was particularly praised, contributing to a partnership-based cooperation. While there was a suggestion for more curiosity in the design brief, it did not detract from the overall positive sentiment regarding collaboration and reliability.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2422792"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="310520"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1986395"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software & Website Development for Design Studio</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 29, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              PM was very committed, <b>open to changes</b> and acting quickly both in contact with the client and the project team. She signaled problems, <b>suggested solutions</b> and acted to prevent possible delays that could result from many sides. The entire cooperation was very pleasant, reliable, and professional despite the short deadline. It was a very partnership-based cooperation. Commitment, knowledge, extremely fast actions, willingness to discuss problems and find solutions, good communication, <b>partnership, openness</b>, a well-coordinated team you can rely on.
            </p>
          </div>

        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback regarding Nullgravity&#39;s proactive approach is overwhelmingly positive. Clients noted their dedication to the project, with one stating, &#34;The whole team was completely dedicated to the project,&#34; highlighting their commitment to user research and product development. Additionally, regular communication and collaboration were emphasized, with clients appreciating the team&#39;s involvement in key meetings despite geographical challenges. Overall, clients expressed satisfaction with Nullgravity&#39;s proactive engagement throughout the project&#39;s lifecycle.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight MileStep, LLC&#39;s proactive approach, particularly praising Eugene&#39;s ability to quickly grasp project goals and provide valuable insights. One client noted their impressive communication style, with daily standups and frequent updates via Slack, fostering a collaborative environment. Additionally, the team&#39;s sense of responsibility and accountability contributed to a productive partnership, reinforcing the sentiment that MileStep is dedicated to supporting their clients effectively.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="246918"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="81295"
          data-gtm_insight_id="834254"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Ruby on Rails Web App Rebuild for B2B Fitness App</h5>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Great team
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Baltic Amadeus for their exceptional team, highlighting their professionalism and collaborative spirit. One client noted, &#39;they have some golden people on their team,&#39; while another emphasized their ability to work as &#39;one team&#39; and their genuine involvement in product development. The overall sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the team&#39;s expertise and responsiveness, contributing significantly to project success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

          data-gtm_insight_id="828173"

            </div>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1616024"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1203234"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Creative
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Creative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding Codener LTD&#39;s creativity is highly positive. Clients appreciate their friendly and responsive approach, highlighting instances where Codener&#39;s creative input exceeded initial expectations. One client noted that allowing Codener creative freedom led to results that were &#39;much better than what we initially planned.&#39; While some clients mentioned a need for guidance on specific design requirements, the general feedback emphasizes Codener&#39;s ability to deliver aesthetically pleasing and professional designs.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1616024"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="146203"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1203234"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Content Design for E-Commerce Marketing Agency</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 11, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The Codener team is very communicative and friendly to talk to. When I give them the end outcome of a project, I don't tell them what the color palette or design should look like. I've left them to put their own style and note and the results have been much better than what we initially planned. <b>Their creativity, responsiveness, and politeness play a key role in me trusting them with our company's work</b>. We're extremely pleased with Codener's amazing work.

                        </div>
                    
                
            </div>

    </div>
</div>

        <div class="lm-only-related-block">
    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that company’s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>
